comments:
Open attached report in the 2006-08-15 BIRT designer build. Right click on the table, select "Edit Data Binding", then select "Dataset Parameter Binding". Select the only parameter in the list, then click on "Edit". Nothing happens. Checking the Eclipse error log, the following NullPointerException is found.

I can't seem to find a workaround for this issue. This blocks further testing with date/time parameters in the designer.
